title: IBM Cloud Code Engine docs
introduction: Find recommended topics, videos, and links to important Code Engine content.

section_recommended.title: Getting started with Code Engine
section_recommended.description: IBM Cloud Code Engine is a fully managed, serverless platform that runs your containerized workloads, including web apps, micro-services, event-driven functions, or batch jobs. Find out how to get started.

section_recommended.title: Planning for Code Engine
section_recommended.description: Find out how Code Engine can work for you.

section_recommended.title: Code Engine tutorials
section_recommended.description: Try out Code Engine with tutorials designed for beginners through experienced Cloud users.

tiles.title: Referencing configmaps and secrets with the CLI
tiles.description: Updated information about referencing existing and not-yet-created configmaps and secrets with the CLI.

tiles.title: Running a job
tiles.description: Updated information about running batch jobs to include running a job with the CLI without first defining a job configuration.

tiles.title: Code Engine is supported in a new region
tiles.description: Code Engine is supported in a new region: Asia Pacific Osaka (jp-osa).
